universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Outfit' or 'Fredoka'.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use Dark Pink (#831843) or Slate (#1E293B).
ALWAYS use rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl for containers to maintain the friendly aesthetic.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility, especially with pink backgrounds.
Use 'Profe Marce' (the mascot) for help tips and empty states.
Primary Level: Use large icons, less text, more colors.
Secondary Level: Balanced text and visuals, standard charts.
University Level: Dense data, professional layout, advanced charts.
All text must be in Spanish (Argentina).
Use 'recharts' for data visualization with the custom palette.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building 'EstadísticaMente'. Start by setting up the global CSS variables in index.css to match the pink palette. Then, create the layout wrapper with the pink sidebar. Build the Home screen with the 3 level selection buttons. Ensure the 'Profe Marce' chatbot is accessible from the sidebar. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
